job_description:
Toronto-based VerticalScope is one of the largest and fastest-growing digital community technology platforms in North America. Our unique combination of wholly-owned community (forum) websites and commerce-driven content sites offers shoppers critical information that they can’t get from other sources, attracting a unique audience and blue-chip advertisers seeking to reach them. Our platform reaches audiences in several high-value verticals including automotive, outdoors, powersports, pets, home, consumer technology, and health & wellness, to name a few.

From a technology perspective, VerticalScope is the single largest vertically-focused digital community platform in Canada. Our presence accounts for the second-largest deployment on Google Cloud. As an employee, you will receive a competitive salary and a full range of benefits, take advantage of learning programs, and contribute to an international team whose passion is innovation, driven by a collaborative merit-based culture.

Job Summary
Every month, millions of North Americans use our portfolio company, RateMDs.com to research and connect with their next healthcare provider. RateMDs is one of the first review platforms on the internet and has grown to house more than 4.5MM reviews of almost 600k health practitioners and facilities around the world.

The RateMDs team is looking for an amazing Senior Developer to help accelerate our growth! Reporting to the VP, Subscription Listings, this role has a pivotal role to play in ensuring we’re building our product for long-term, sustained success.

What You’ll Do
As a Senior Developer, you will collaborate with our engineers, product managers, and designers to help operate and grow RateMDs.com by:
-Leading the engineering practice at RateMDs to evolve our product’s capabilities for patients, healthcare providers and clinic staff.
-Being the senior engineering mind on a cross-functional team operating as a start-up within VerticalScope.
-Working with our best-in-class partners to update millions of data points on healthcare providers and clinics globallyWriting and shipping readable, maintainable, testable code.
-Executing on other related responsibilities and ad hoc projects as needed to meet the ongoing needs of the company.

About You
5+ years of experience in software development
3+ years of experience in web application development using Django, Python, React.js, ElasticSearch or equivilant
Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience

You’re a Great Fit if you have
Full-stack experience working with JavaScript & CSS
Experience building Saas for SMBs in the health & wellness vertical
Experience with Stripe or Google Ad Manager
Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Google Cloud Platform, or Fastly
Experience with digital directories, vertical marketplaces or review sitesiOS & Android Native development experience

Our Values
Authentic
Respectful: We treat everyone with respect
Diverse: We believe diverse backgrounds + perspectives make us stronger
Clear: We are clear about our intentions + feedback

Scrappy
Empowered: We trust each other to make decisions in the long-term interests of the company
Resourceful: We find creative solutions
Nimble: We work with a sense of urgency + flexibility

Curious
Inquisitive: We challenge our assumptions with data
Experimenting: We take calculated risks and learn quickly through failure
Learning: We view hard problems as opportunities to grow
